title: Kontakt 5 v5.5.0 UNLOCKED - Tracer
description:
Native Instruments Kontakt v5.5.0 UNLOCKED


     THE WORLD'S MOST POWERFUL SAMPLER

Once again, NATIVE INSTRUMENTS raises the bar with KONTAKT 5 -- the latest version of the industry-leading sampler. KONTAKT 5 takes a bold leap forward with 37 new filters, four new on-board studio effects, updated time-stretching, a new instrument bus system and more. As you will see from the new STUDIO DRUMMER, for example, it's a deep-rooted update to the KONTAKT platform, allowing us -- and you -- to create even better instruments and more powerful, expressive sounds.




CHANGELOG v5.5.0::

- Kontakt/Battery instruments can be saved directly from within KOMPLETE KONTROL and MASCHINE
- Time Machine Pro voice settings can be controlled from KSP
- Developers can change the contents of an FX Slots from KSP
- Time related effect parameters can be controlled via KSP (Delay, Chorus, Flanger, Phaser)
- The way that users interact with parameters associated with time within FX has been
improved with more consistent behaviour.
- There are no longer CPU spikes when manipulating the host-tempo while playing back a Kontakt instrument.
- Performance has been increased when processing MIDI CC events.



SUPPORTED INTERFACES

   Stand-alone
   VST
   Audio Units
   RTAS (Pro Tools 9 + 10)
   ASIO
   CoreAudio
   WASAPI
   AAX IS NOT SUPPORTED HERE!


SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

Windows 7 or Windows 8 (latest Service Pack, 32/64-bit), Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2, 2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)

[Installation]

       UnRar (use latest Winrar version)

       Unistall previus version.

       Install Kontakt with the included Setup.

       If Done: Apply the Patch from the 'RegPatch' Folder !as Admin!
       ( use the one who fit's to your Sys-Architecture [32 or 64 Bit] )
